name: San Mateo County Library Digital Resources
description: Free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning with San Mateo County library card
fullDescription: San Mateo County Library offers free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, streaming content, and online learning for all cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks via Libby
- Streaming video (Kanopy)
- Calm meditation app access
- LinkedIn Learning
- Research databases
- Digital magazines
howToGetIt:
1. Get a San Mateo County Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit smcl.org/resource
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on any device
keywords: San Mateo County Library, digital resources, ebooks, audiobooks, Libby, Kanopy, Calm, LinkedIn Learning, databases, magazines
